tasks.title: Implement Core Foundation
tasks.description: Shared domain primitives: BaseEntity, AggregateRoot, DomainEvent interfaces. Event bus setup with RabbitMQ and outbox pattern.

tasks.title: Implement Identity & Authentication
tasks.description: OAuth2 authentication, encrypted token storage, user profile management, UserRepository (SQLite + Postgres). Foundation for all user-facing functionality.

tasks.title: Implement CLI Interface
tasks.description: Cobra-based CLI with command structure for all bounded contexts. Primary interface for users.

tasks.title: Implement Billing & Entitlements
tasks.description: Stripe integration, module (Orbit) entitlement management, subscription handling. Controls access to premium features. COMPLETED: SQLite entitlement and subscription repositories, factory methods, migration for subscriptions table, comprehensive tests.

tasks.title: Implement Productivity Core
tasks.description: Task management with CORE framework (Capture, Organize, Review, Execute). Task creation, prioritization, duration estimates, completion tracking. COMPLETED: UpdateTaskHandler, StartTaskHandler, show/start/update CLI commands, comprehensive tests.

tasks.title: Implement Calendar Integrations
tasks.description: Multi-provider calendar sync (Google, Outlook, Apple). Bi-directional sync with conflict detection. COMPLETED: ConflictDetector implementation that checks imported events against Orbita blocks, ConflictDetectorHandler for worker integration, comprehensive tests.

tasks.title: Implement Scheduling Engine
tasks.description: Central scheduling service consuming candidates from tasks, habits, meetings. Hard constraints, soft penalties, Ideal Week alignment. COMPLETED: CandidateCollector aggregates items from tasks/habits/meetings, IdealWeekConstraintProvider integrates ideal week templates, ScheduleDayHandler orchestrates scheduling with constraint-aware placement, comprehensive tests.

tasks.title: Implement Smart Habits
tasks.description: Habit tracking with adaptive scheduling. Learns optimal times, generates sessions, adjusts based on completion patterns. COMPLETED: OptimalTimeCalculator analyzes completion patterns to determine best habit times with confidence scoring, GenerateSessionsHandler creates scheduled habit sessions using learned patterns or preferred time fallback, comprehensive tests for both services.

tasks.title: Implement Smart 1:1 Scheduler
tasks.description: Intelligent meeting coordination for recurring 1:1s. Frequency management, optimal slot finding, calendar coordination.

tasks.title: Implement AI Inbox Processing
tasks.description: AI-powered inbox for capturing and classifying items. Auto-categorization, prioritization, routing to contexts.

tasks.title: Implement Automations Engine
tasks.description: User-defined automation rules with triggers, conditions, and actions. Workflow automation without coding.

tasks.title: Implement Time Insights & Analytics
tasks.description: Analytics with time tracking, productivity metrics, goal progress, trend analysis. Actionable insights.

tasks.title: Implement Wellness Sync
tasks.description: Health and wellness tracking integration. Syncs with fitness devices to incorporate wellness data into scheduling.
